website_summaries.verdict: Whether you like to dunk them in milk, have them with coffee, or eat them right out of the pack, classic Oreos have an unmistakable flavor that has been a favorite among cookie lovers for more than 100 years.
pros: Iconic Oreos with the classic chocolate and creme flavor
Traditionalists love dunking these cookies in milk
Great with dessert, coffee, or by themselves
cons: Reports of broken cookies from shipping
Double Stuf lovers aren't satisfied with the amount of filling

customer_reviews.title: Son was happy!
customer_reviews.text: My son was away from home for the first time. After boot camp he had school. I know he was a little homesick so I send him his favorite Oreo cookies. Since he was 5 years old he always have a couple of Oreo’s and a glass of milk every night. He was happy when he got two packages of Oreo’s. It made him feel a little closer to home.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Kids and grandkids know what's best!
customer_reviews.text: For years coming to grandma's meant going to the freezer to get some Oreos. Special. Now that they are away at school, I send them care packages containing their chocolate treat. "Oreos" says love!
customer_reviews.author: Alleycat

customer_reviews.title: Same classic oreo
customer_reviews.text: Basically and oreo is well an oreo. They taste the same is any oreo I've ever eaten before. So of course they are good. One of my complaints is that the plastic that holds the oreos is loud. I know that it's always been like that. Still it's so hard to sneak one without my kid hearing. Then of course I have to share when he does My other complaint t is that the flap that opens doesn't close well. It stops sticking before we finish the cookies. Many times they have to be tossed because they got soft and gross from the flap not staying closed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hurley

customer_reviews.title: package contaminated?
customer_reviews.text: Bought a bunch of food on Amazon and the oreos package was cut open in two places. i still ate them all and didn't die so i guess they were okay. a little stale but once the milk soaks in who can tell the difference. i know i couldn't; they were delicious. minus 1 star for the careless worker cutting open my cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Steele

customer_reviews.title: Amazon, please check you math
customer_reviews.text: The Family Size is 1 lb plus 3.1 oz, not 3.1 oz stated on the Amazon web page as March 2019 and months before. The Family size is a good value per oz. The three rows of many cookies are plenty to last many days. They consistently taste good.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Zen

customer_reviews.title: They are Oreos and They are DELICIOUS
customer_reviews.text: What can I honestly say about Oreos other than "they are one of the best cookies ever invented". The Oreos we received were fresh and delicious as always, and are perfect for dipping into a tall glass of cold milk. All of our cookies arrived whole and intact - not that it mattered because our family of four finished this pack within days of opening. If you haven't had an Oreo cookie, you haven't lived life yet - they're delicious, go buy yourself a pack.
customer_reviews.author: K. Chan

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love Oreos? Biggest problem is reminding my kids as to proper portion size. The package has lasted over a week I am happy to say.
customer_reviews.author: JulieT

customer_reviews.title: Great with a short soak in milk
customer_reviews.text: I miss WhoNu (later, WhoKnew) nutrition-fortified cookies, which I suspect Nabisco ran outa business buy selling Oreos at much lower prices for a two or three years. But these'll do for now. They could replace a good deal of the filling's sugar with a blend of zero-cal natural sweeteners.
customer_reviews.author: S. Stockton

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's just me, but these taste way sweeter than when I've had them in the past. I thought maybe if I dunked them in milk, it would taste like it used to, but no, still too sweet. It would be 5-star if it didn't taste as sweet. They also didn't seem as fresh as they could have been.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Hay

customer_reviews.title: Good cookies
customer_reviews.text: I have not eaten Oreos for a long time. I had a recipe for chocolate cheesecake that I wanted to try and it called for Oreo Cookies. Turned out great. They were very fresh and just perfect for my recipe.
customer_reviews.author: B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I love Oreos I was the only one in my family ...
customer_reviews.text: I love Oreos I was the only one in my family that like chocolate, hard to believe. One brother liked lemon, one cherry. But my grandmother made all three when we visited.
customer_reviews.author: doolittle

customer_reviews.title: Chemical taste
customer_reviews.text: Never had any problems with store bought Oreo's but the ones I ordered on Amazon had such a horrible chemical taste to them that we couldn't eat them and I ended up throwing the whole package away. Will be sticking to store bought from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Kiweedles

customer_reviews.title: It's that good. You can not eat just one
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about such a classic snack? There is a reason it's still popular, long after Hydrox cookies disappeared from the market. It's that good. You can not eat just one. Whether you eat each onw whole, or you open each to lick the filling, this is a treat.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cummins

customer_reviews.title: Close to expiration
customer_reviews.text: The packet I got is about 3 months before the expiration date, which tasted fine, but I wonder should it be discounted by a lot if they are going to send near-expired food?
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Finally a big enough package!
customer_reviews.text: Nice big pack at a fair price. You just as well grab most of a row, or you'll be going back again and again and again! What else to say, they are Oreo's delivered to your door in a bigger pack (I sort of consider the standard 'small' packs either a single or double serving)!
customer_reviews.author: FlyboyyyTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: All cookies were intact and very yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what can be said in this review that you don’t already know about Oreos. These are super yummy and very fresh. They arrived in perfect condition without one broken cookie.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Oreo is life
customer_reviews.text: This or double stuff. Always the same dilemma. You get more with the regular but that double is divine for dividing it in half for each side of the cookie. Tough call for sure but life is full of tough choices. Lucky that either way you go on this one you cant be wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Dj fidel

customer_reviews.title: Awful. Taste bad, smell odd , hardly any filling. Seem stale.
customer_reviews.text: Awful. Not buying Oreos again. I used to love them. The package of cookies I got from Amazon did not have the rich cocoa aroma or taste that Oreos used to have. They were stale, hardly any filling, I threw them away. What happened to Oreos???????
customer_reviews.author: Janet J.

customer_reviews.title: Always an excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: Love Oreo's. Great chocolate flavor without being overwhelming. Especially good with a glass of milk. The perfect dunking cookie. They are very addictive.
customer_reviews.author: arolee

customer_reviews.title: Too Good To Eat Just One
customer_reviews.text: Ok They are delicious. Makes me want to drink milk. I admit I like these cookies way too much, so I always have milk. That makes it okay.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Gone in 60 seconds
customer_reviews.text: What the hecks wrong with you selling something so delicious? They do not last. It was like a shark feeding frenzy. Nothing left but the wrapper. SMH
customer_reviews.author: Michael s thrower

customer_reviews.title: Value for quantity & quality-
customer_reviews.text: arrive in good ship condition, lots of calories for us the calorie watchers-, but makes a great snack or dessert-
customer_reviews.author: GrannyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Soothes PMS symptoms
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for teenage girls who have PMS. Keep these on hand and as they begin to rage and act Emo just throw these at them and they will calm right down and fall into a carb coma. Also I think they are vegan friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Knowles

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Cookies
customer_reviews.text: These are just right to take care of your sweet tooth. I like the eat the creme middle the best. Most of the time I save the actual cookie part to feed to our chickens! Yes, our chicken love oreo cookies too! We have one that I have named Oreo, because she refuses to share a cookie with anyone. She will pick it a whole one up, take off, and eat the whole thing!
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: They're Oreos..what else do you need to say?
customer_reviews.text: They're Oreos..what else do you need to say? And I can be a "family" of one for the "Family Size."
customer_reviews.author: Richard C. Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Big benefits
customer_reviews.text: I love the pull down package opening to protect the cookies in the package. The cookies are yummy
customer_reviews.author: Marianne W Morse

customer_reviews.title: Mexican Oreos Are Bad
customer_reviews.text: Prime sent me a box of Oreos made in Mexico. They taste different, had a weird smell and flavor. Kind of like they were sitting in a cardboard box for too long. I ended up throwing them out and I'll make sure to only buy Oreos from the USA. Don't trust these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FRIENDS LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.text: You can not go wrong with OREO cookies. When friends come over they always take out the OREO cookies. As luck has it.. I always have an extra bag for those friends of mine!
customer_reviews.author: ❤️OUR COUNTRY🇺🇸

customer_reviews.title: Not fresh
customer_reviews.text: Cookies were soft. Maybe in the warehouse too long but they were not fresh. Won't order online again.
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: Good af.
customer_reviews.text: Bruh lemme tell you dis these hit different. They were perfect but I didnt have to go to the store so I was able to be lazy so they tasted that much better. Only warning: they are a little bit more fragile than ones bought at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Carter

customer_reviews.title: Oreos Is The Cookie You’ ll Come Back For!
customer_reviews.text: Please Becareful When You Eat One, You’ll Come Back For More And More!
customer_reviews.author: JOYCE JEFFERSON-BELL

customer_reviews.title: They taste great!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Oreos. He can't get enough of them. In fact I have to make sure he doesn't eat too many because he might get a belly ache. Dairy free which is amazing since he has dairy allergies. He loves them with a spoon of almond butter.
customer_reviews.author: Arman

customer_reviews.title: Oreos
customer_reviews.text: Oreos are always yummy! They can about 1/2 cracked this time.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: OREO COOKIES..
customer_reviews.text: I USUALLY LOVE THESE COOKIES, BUT T HIS BATCH HAD NO FILLING, IT SEEMED ALL DRIED UP , HARDLY ANY THERE. VERY DISAPOINTED
customer_reviews.author: cookster

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping with no tears or leaks! Love this cookie!
customer_reviews.author: China Knight

customer_reviews.title: product arrived in undamaged condition
customer_reviews.text: s always oreo cookies are a great snack when eayen in moderation
customer_reviews.author: Brian Newell

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for oreos!
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love oreos? This family size bag of oreos does not disapoint!
customer_reviews.author: Seabass

customer_reviews.title: OREOS.... !!!
customer_reviews.text: OREOS.... good cookies, but priced about the same as in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Pcolafun

customer_reviews.title: 5 star duh
customer_reviews.text: They’re Oreos what more needs to be said. 5 star all day every day
customer_reviews.author: David p

customer_reviews.title: Oreos are irresistible!
customer_reviews.text: Oreos are our guilty pleasure, and I could not believe the price I got for the family size in my Prime Pantry box!
customer_reviews.author: Kamry M.

customer_reviews.title: Yuummyy
customer_reviews.text: Main benefit is VALUE & CONVENIENCE of delivery. Never had a bad Oreo
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Arrived intact and on time
customer_reviews.text: We buy these in bulk for our restaurant and needed this large order delivered. The cookies arrived fine without damage and without being stale
customer_reviews.author: Gabbie

customer_reviews.title: They taste like imitation Oreos - definitely not buying them again
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase Oreos online. They taste like imitation Oreos - definitely not buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: juliens04

customer_reviews.title: Perfect with milk!!
customer_reviews.text: Love that I was able to order this product online at Amazon. They are soooo good they are my go-to cookie.
customer_reviews.author: Byronious Maximus Primus

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: Not sure but these oreos have a gritty cream filling. My husband looks oreos but he couldn't eat these.
customer_reviews.author: tj7411

customer_reviews.title: Broken cookies
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and great price. But half of the cookies were broken.
customer_reviews.author: Maddcheck

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Cookie
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, fresh cookies. All of them were in the package and intact, thank u.
customer_reviews.author: Tashauna Moton

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Just tastes like Oreos. Glad they’re available on Amazon. Little bit stale though
customer_reviews.author: John Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: So yummy!
customer_reviews.text: These came in great condition, clean and not smashed at all! This package lasted about 5 minutes with my children! These are so good and chocolaty and have a yummy frosting inside them. There is nothing better than relaxing with your family and dunking oreos in ice cold milk!
customer_reviews.author: Jenlol

customer_reviews.title: BEST most popular cookie EVER
customer_reviews.text: So, really, how can you go wrong with OREO?? Used for making a pie crust, with some to spare for the family to snack on!! Very good all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Mom to Six

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Good deal except a lot of them came crushed. My kids still enjoyed them & don't mind them too much being like that.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: MY FAVORITE HANDS DOWN WITH A NICE COLD GLASS OF MILK YUM YUM
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Why Ruin It With Milk?
customer_reviews.text: I mean, they are Oreos. Everyone has had Oreos. Oreos are the best. Try not to eat an entire row, it's almost impossible. Don't dunk it in milk; don't dilute the delicious flavor of the Oreo.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: The Greatest Commerically Produced Cookie Ever Created (Mic Drop)
customer_reviews.text: Nothing I can add to expand on the splendor of this wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: DIY Guy

customer_reviews.title: They're Oreos
customer_reviews.text: What can you say? Of course it gets 5 ⭐. Oreos!!!!

customer_reviews.title: I RECOMMEND to ALL
customer_reviews.text: very qualitative goods!!!! bystry delivery, sociable seller!!!! I RECOMMEND to ALL!!!! SUCCESSFUL PURCHASES!!!

customer_reviews.title: it was a nice surprise! Who doesn't love a huge package of ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow...was surprised how big this package of Oreos was...needless to say, it was a nice surprise ! Who doesn't love a huge package of Oreos !!
customer_reviews.author: J.T.

customer_reviews.title: Oreos
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love Oreos! Great deal and every cookie was tasty and not broken.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What is not to like about Oreos. These were fresh and delicious.

customer_reviews.title: delicious, bite sized, and highly addictive
customer_reviews.text: Come on...they are Oreos... they are delicious, bite sized, and highly addictive. Why are you even reading this review? You are wasting time. Order the OREOS! p.s. here is a study on how awesome Oreos are: [...]
customer_reviews.author: Eric T. Mings

customer_reviews.title: Milk with cookies.  WOW
customer_reviews.text: Oreos are truly the most amazing cookie on the planet. When eaten with a glass of milk prior to bed for me, is just wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Adams

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love Orios? But I gave it 4 stars because ...
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love Orios? But I gave it 4 stars because they're so good I sometimes eat too many and feel like a pig.

customer_reviews.title: Love this original chocolate cookie
customer_reviews.text: Oh yes!!! Nothing like the original Oreo cookie Perfect with a glass of milk
customer_reviews.author: Cyn1492

customer_reviews.title: Review of Oreo cookies
customer_reviews.text: The cookies were delicious I had no problems with delivery or anything else very happy

customer_reviews.title: Cookies were all broken
customer_reviews.text: Can't return this item, or get refund. Cookies arrived smashed and broken.

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived but the cookie bag had a slit which had it opened in the Amazon box. It looks like either a box cutter or Knife. I was disappointed as my daughter was not too keen on eating them.
customer_reviews.author: Marlow

customer_reviews.title: Love Prime Pantry!
customer_reviews.text: Family favorite ordered to send to my son away at college. He was thrilled to receive Oreos and I thought the price was comparable to local stores. I will order again.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Still good!!

customer_reviews.title: Crushed
customer_reviews.text: Most of the cookies where crushed. Have order many times before and haven't had this problem.

customer_reviews.title: Yes.
customer_reviews.text: I mean they’re Oreos 😗 so they’re delicious always. Super freshhhh

customer_reviews.title: Send someone some OREO love
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love an OREO??? Sent these in an Amazon Prime Pantry package to my son. It made him happy so it made me happy. :)

customer_reviews.title: Oreos
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my sister because she likes Oreo Chocolate Sandwich Cookies. Plus, the package was sealed tight, and the Oreos was not broken.

customer_reviews.title: Nope!
customer_reviews.text: Broken up in pieces... crushed to crumbs for half of the package!

customer_reviews.title: Oreos!!!
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love Oreos with some milk. I mean if you haven't had Oreos then you need to quit messing around and try them!

customer_reviews.title: 1-lb zip-lock bag is still the best for freshness
customer_reviews.text: Don't trust the self closing top, 1-lb zip-lock bag is still the best for freshness.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my husbands favorite cookie. This will give him a snack in 5 of his lunches. Thank you for such a great price and for making my husband a happy man at work.

customer_reviews.title: Divine
customer_reviews.text: They're chocolate. They're creme filled. They're OREOs. What's not to like? Pretty sure it will be the food of choice in heaven.

customer_reviews.title: Oreos are excellent at curing cranky husbands and kids alike
customer_reviews.text: Take a grumpy man in his 50s, add one cold, rainy winter day and a list of unpleasant Honey-Do chores and you get more whining & muttering than a pair of four year olds forced to eat all the Brussels sprouts on their dinner plates. Fortunately, the cure is the same for both.... a pile of fresh, original Oreos and a glass of milk. This big family size package is a bit larger than a regular pack of Oreos, but not enormous. I typically transfer the cookies to Ziploc bags immediately after opening so they stay fresh. The releasable sticky thing on the package is not really intended to work more than a few days at best.
customer_reviews.author: Dogs & Horses

customer_reviews.title: Eat a sleeve or three.
customer_reviews.text: They are the classic cookie snack. Really? These have always been and will always be fabulous.

product_meta.title: OREO Chocolate Sandwich Cookies, Family Size, 19.1 OZ
product_meta.description:
Take a delicious break with OREO Chocolate Sandwich Cookies, America's favorite sandwich cookie for over 100 years. Supremely dunkable, OREO cookies sandwich a rich creme filling between the bold taste of two chocolate wafers--making them milk's favorite cookie. Original OREO cookies are great for serving at parties, packing in school lunches, or mixing into your favorite dessert recipe. The resealable container with easy-pull tab keeps chocolate cookies fresh and is perfect for snacking, sharing, or traveling.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Product Dimensions :1.84 x 9 x 6.22 inches; 1 Pounds
 * Item model number :PDK_00000068437
 * Date First Available :May 16, 2018
 * Manufacturer :Mondelez Warehouse
 * ASIN :B00R2O5JD0

 * 

 * Customer Reviews:4.8 out of 5 stars2,440 ratings Take a delicious break with OREO Chocolate Sandwich Cookies, America's favorite sandwich cookie for over 100 years. Supremely dunkable, OREO cookies sandwich a rich creme filling between the bold taste of two chocolate wafers--making them milk's favorite cookie. Original OREO cookies are great for serving at parties, packing in school lunches, or mixing into your favorite dessert recipe. The resealable container with easy-pull tab keeps chocolate cookies fresh and is perfect for snacking, sharing, or traveling.
feature_bullets: One 19.1 oz family size package of OREO Chocolate Sandwich Cookies
Chocolate wafers filled with original OREO creme
Family size cookies are great for sharing with friends and family
Resealable package helps keep snack cookies fresh
